game.name: Porta-Tower
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Porta-Tower is a roguelike tower defense game where you can pick up and move your towers when their position becomes suboptimal. Relocate, upgrade, and unlock towers to defend your portal until the very end.
